title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 225-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies throughout the State of New York
except that the provisions in section
225-3.3
(c) of this

Subpart applies only throughout the New York City CMSA as defined by section
225-3.2
(b)(3)(i)
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
225-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
